import React,{useState,useEffect,useRef}from'react';import'./SearchEngine.css';// Gerekli CSS dosyasƒ±
import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SearchEngine=()=>{const videoRefs=useRef(new Map());const videoTimeoutRef=useRef(null);// Timeout ID'yi tutmak i√ßin
const[query,setQuery]=useState('');const[searchType,setSearchType]=useState('all');const[results,setResults]=useState({fileshares:[]});const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const[error,setError]=useState('');const[hasSearched,setHasSearched]=useState(false);const[activeVideoPreview,setActiveVideoPreview]=useState(null);// ‚úÖ Move useState to top level
// DEBUG: Dosya kontrol√º (Yerinde Kalmalƒ±)
useEffect(()=>{const checkPublicFiles=async()=>{try{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');const response=await fetch('http://localhost:8001/api/files/',{headers:{'Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(token)}});if(response.ok){const files=await response.json();console.log('Kullanƒ±cƒ± dosyalarƒ±:',files);}}catch(error){console.error('Dosya kontrol hatasƒ±:',error);}};checkPublicFiles();},[]);const setVideoRef=(fileId,element)=>{if(element){videoRefs.current.set(fileId,element);}else{videoRefs.current.delete(fileId);}};const handleVideoMouseEnter=fileId=>{const videoElement=videoRefs.current.get(fileId);if(videoElement){// √ñnceki zamanlayƒ±cƒ±yƒ± temizle
if(videoTimeoutRef.current){clearTimeout(videoTimeoutRef.current);}// Oynatmayƒ± dene
videoElement.play().catch(e=>console.log("Video Play Error:",e));// 5 saniye sonra durdurma mantƒ±ƒüƒ±nƒ± ayarla
videoTimeoutRef.current=setTimeout(()=>{// Eƒüer video hala bu element ise durdur.
if(videoElement){videoElement.pause();videoElement.currentTime=0;// Ba≈üa sar
}},5000);// 5 saniye
}};// 3. Fare Video Alanƒ±ndan √áƒ±ktƒ±ƒüƒ±nda
const handleVideoMouseLeave=fileId=>{const videoElement=videoRefs.current.get(fileId);if(videoElement){// Zamanlayƒ±cƒ±yƒ± hemen temizle
if(videoTimeoutRef.current){clearTimeout(videoTimeoutRef.current);}// Durdur ve ba≈üa sar
videoElement.pause();videoElement.currentTime=0;}};// ‚úÖ YARDIMCI FONKSƒ∞YON: Dosya Tipine G√∂re ƒ∞kon Belirleme
const getFileIcon=fileName=>{if(!fileName)return'fa-file';const ext=fileName.split('.').pop().toLowerCase();const iconMap={jpg:'fa-file-image',jpeg:'fa-file-image',png:'fa-file-image',gif:'fa-file-image',pdf:'fa-file-pdf',doc:'fa-file-word',docx:'fa-file-word',xls:'fa-file-excel',xlsx:'fa-file-excel',ppt:'fa-file-powerpoint',pptx:'fa-file-powerpoint',zip:'fa-file-archive',rar:'fa-file-archive',mp3:'fa-file-audio',wav:'fa-file-audio',mp4:'fa-file-video',avi:'fa-file-video',txt:'fa-file-alt',js:'fa-file-code',html:'fa-file-code',css:'fa-file-code',default:'fa-file'};return iconMap[ext]||iconMap.default;};// ‚úÖ YENƒ∞ YARDIMCI FONKSƒ∞YON: Dosya tipine g√∂re √∂nizleme i√ßeriƒüini olu≈üturan fonksiyon
const renderFilePreview=fileShare=>{const previewSrc=fileShare.preview_url||fileShare.file_url;const fileExtension=fileShare.file_name?fileShare.file_name.split('.').pop().toLowerCase():'';const isImage=['jpg','jpeg','png','gif','bmp','webp'].includes(fileExtension);const isVideo=['mp4','mov','avi','wmv','flv','webm'].includes(fileExtension);const isAudio=['mp3','wav','ogg','aac'].includes(fileExtension);const isPdf=['pdf'].includes(fileExtension);if(isImage&&previewSrc){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"file-preview-content",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:previewSrc,alt:fileShare.file_name,className:"preview-image-tag"})});}if(isVideo&&previewSrc){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"file-preview-content",onMouseEnter:()=>handleVideoMouseEnter(fileShare.id),onMouseLeave:()=>handleVideoMouseLeave(fileShare.id),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("video",{ref:el=>setVideoRef(fileShare.id,el),muted:true,loop:false,preload:"metadata",className:"preview-video",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("source",{src:previewSrc,type:"video/".concat(fileExtension)})})});}else if(isAudio){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"file-preview-content audio-preview",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"preview-icon-large",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fas fa-music"})})});}else if(isPdf&&previewSrc){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"file-preview-content pdf-preview",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("iframe",{src:previewSrc,title:fileShare.file_name,className:"preview-iframe"})});}else{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"file-preview-content document-preview",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"preview-icon-large",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fas ".concat(getFileIcon(fileShare.file_name))})})});}};// 1. ‚úÖ YARDIMCI FONKSƒ∞YON: Arama Sonu√ßlarƒ±nƒ± Temizle
const handleClear=()=>{setQuery('');setResults({fileshares:[]});setHasSearched(false);setError('');};// 2. ‚úÖ ANA FONKSƒ∞YON: Arama ƒ∞≈ülemi (API ve JSON Hata √á√∂z√ºmleri Dahil)
const handleSearch=async e=>{e.preventDefault();if(!query.trim())return;setLoading(true);setError('');setHasSearched(true);try{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');const response=await fetch("http://localhost:8001/api/search/?q=".concat(encodeURIComponent(query)),{headers:{'Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(token),'Content-Type':'application/json'}});if(!response.ok){const errorData=await response.json();throw new Error("Arama hatas\u0131: ".concat(errorData.message||response.status));}const data=await response.json();const searchResults=data.results||data;const allFiles=[...(searchResults.files||[]),...(searchResults.group_files||[])];setResults({fileshares:allFiles});}catch(err){console.error('Arama sƒ±rasƒ±nda bir hata olu≈ütu:',err);setError(err.message||'Arama sƒ±rasƒ±nda beklenmeyen bir hata olu≈ütu.');setResults({fileshares:[]});}finally{setLoading(false);}};// 3. ‚úÖ RENDER FONKSƒ∞YONU: √ñnizleme ve Tasarƒ±m
const renderSearchResults=()=>{const{fileshares}=results;if(loading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"loading-state",children:"\uD83D\uDD0D Herkese A\xE7\u0131k Dosyalar Aran\u0131yor..."});}if(fileshares.length===0){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"no-results",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"no-results-icon",children:"\uD83E\uDD37\u200D\u2642\uFE0F"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Sonu\xE7 bulunamad\u0131"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Arad\u0131\u011F\u0131n\u0131z anahtar kelimeye uygun herkese a\xE7\u0131k dosya bulunamad\u0131."})]});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"results-grid",children:fileshares.map(fileShare=>{let clickUrl=fileShare.share_url||fileShare.file_url||'#';if(clickUrl!=='#'&&!clickUrl.endsWith('/')){clickUrl+='/';// üö® URL'nin sonuna eƒüik √ßizgiyi ekle
}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"result-card",onClick:()=>{if(clickUrl&&clickUrl!=='#'){window.open(clickUrl,'_blank');}else{console.warn("Tƒ±klama i√ßin ge√ßerli URL bulunamadƒ±.");}},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"file-preview-container",children:renderFilePreview(fileShare)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"result-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{title:fileShare.file_name,children:fileShare.file_name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"file-owner",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fas fa-user"})," ",fileShare.created_by_username||'Anonim']}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"file-stats",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"stat",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fas fa-clock"})," ",fileShare.upload_time_ago||'Tarih Yok']}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"stat",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fas fa-eye"})," ",fileShare.view_count||0]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"file-badges",children:[fileShare.is_one_time_view&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"badge badge-one-time",children:"Tek G\xF6sterimlik"}),fileShare.is_password_protected&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"badge badge-password",children:"\u015Eifreli"})]})]})]},fileShare.id);})});};// Component Return
return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"search-engine","data-theme":"dark",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("header",{className:"search-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Herkese A\xE7\u0131k Dosya Arama Motoru"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Milyonlarca payla\u015F\u0131lan dosya aras\u0131nda arama yap\u0131n."})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("form",{className:"search-form",onSubmit:handleSearch,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"search-input-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:query,onChange:e=>setQuery(e.target.value),placeholder:"Dosya ad\u0131, kullan\u0131c\u0131 ad\u0131...",className:"search-input"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"search-btn",disabled:loading||!query.trim(),children:loading?'üîç Aranƒ±yor...':'üîç Ara'}),hasSearched&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",onClick:handleClear,className:"clear-btn",children:"\u2716 Temizle"})]})}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"error-message",children:["\u274C ",error]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"search-results",children:hasSearched||loading?renderSearchResults():/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"search-placeholder",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"placeholder-icon",children:"\uD83D\uDD0D"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Arama yap\u0131n"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Herkese a\xE7\u0131k dosyalar\u0131 bulmak i\xE7in yukar\u0131dan arama yap\u0131n."})]})})]});};export default SearchEngine;
